casebody.data:
Donald MILLER and Dorothy Miller, Appellants-Plaintiffs,
v.
CRAWFORDSVILLE ELECTRIC LIGHT AND POWER and City of Crawfordsville, Appellees-Defendants. Court of Appeals Case No. 54A01-1608-PL-2048 Court of Appeals of Indiana. September 20, 2017

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

BROWN , J.

Affirmed.

VAIDIK, C.J., Concurs.

BRADFORD, J., Concurs.
